attributes.action: call upon Transport for London (TfL) and the Mayor of London, Mr Ken Livingstone, to give motorcycle and scooter riders immediate access to those bus lanes in London that form part of the Transport for London Network (TLRN). Thus saving the lives of at least 9 motorcycle and scooter users annually.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is believed that the lives of 9 motorcycle and or scooter riders could be saved annually in London by Transport for London (TfL) endorsing the use of bus lanes for those modes. This view was endorsed by a TfL preliminary report on bus lane usage which is now stalled.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
